Charities

Our Charities

The Cambridge University India Society is dedicated in its aim to fundraise for charities. In fact, all our proceeds go to charity. This year, all our proceeds from our various events and fundraisers will go to:

  • Sri Sathya Sai School
  • The Lymphoma Association

If you have any suggestions or would like to find out more information, please email our President, who will be more than happy to answer any questions you may have.

Cambridge University India Society
